title: Ticket #2426: param_info_c_generator.pl generated code full of warnings
description:
/src/condor_utils/param_info_c_generator.pl generates param_info_init.c. That file, when compiled (by inclusion into param_info.c) generates about 1,000 warnings. Since it's generated code, it should be straightforward to generate clean code.

Frequency of warning: 

637 missing braces around initializer for ‘param_info_t’
363 missing initializer for member ‘param_info_str_t_s::str_val’
  1 no newline at end of file
creator: adesmet
